item.description:
The steering committee is getting us back to our regular schedule of a monthly dinner, a monthly brunch, a monthly pub night, and a monthly discussion group.

This time around, we'll be having a large group dinner at Bertucci's in Central Square. This is easily reachable by taking the Red Line either to Central Square station or Kendall. After dinner, there are any number of great watering holes in easy walking distance, if people want to break up into small groups for post-prandial socializing: Miracle of Science, Cafe Luna, Cuchi-Cuchi, the Asgard, and so on.

These dinners are lively and relaxed -- feel free to bring printouts of online articles for sharing, recent books you've read, any sort of reasonable show-and-tell is welcome.
item.name: Monthly dinner: Bertucci's in Central Square
